column1: SMART SHOPPING COMPARISON - Find the Best Deals!
Hey Aryan! Never overpay again! Use this template to compare prices like a pro shopper!
1. MIN - Finds lowest value: =MIN(B11:B16) finds cheapest price
2. MAX - Finds highest value: =MAX(C11:C16) finds best rating
3. IF with MIN - Best deal finder: =IF(F11=MIN($F$11:$F$16),"BEST DEAL!","")
This checks if this row's total equals the minimum total
4. AVERAGE - Calculate average: =AVERAGE(B11:B16) for average price
5. INDEX-MATCH combo - Advanced! Finds the store name of the winner
INDEX returns value from range, MATCH finds position of MAX score
To highlight the BEST DEAL row in green:
3. Select "Use a formula to determine which cells to format"
5. Click Format > Fill > Green color > OK
2. Conditional Formatting > Highlight Cells Rules > Less Than
3. Enter your budget amount > Green Fill
- Always compare total cost (price + shipping), not just product price!
- Check ratings, but also read recent reviews
- Consider delivery time if you need it urgently
- Factor in return policies and warranty
- Look for coupon codes before checkout!
Happy Smart Shopping Aryan! Save money, spend wisely! - Your Excel Shopping Buddy
